name: Liber Vember
description:
Please restore the wrecked town to how it used to be.
Please find the Vembers and return them to town. The animal and plant friends also must come back soon...
Be off on a journey to find the missing Vembers.

- Game characteristics
* With simple controls, observe the scene and find the proposed characters.
* Stages with various scenes await you.
* Defend the Heart with time gauged traps and items, and bring back the Vembers.
* Provide Sunlight to the Vembers that have returned to town and you will be provided with gifts.
* As more Vembers gather, you'll be able to explore various destinations.

- App permissions
Device photo, media, file access
: This permission is needed in order to store game data on external memory.

- Inquiry
If you have questions while using the app, please contact us through the email address below.

You can check news and update information on Facebook and the website. "
